tools.name: AB Method
tools.description: Simple command to add AB method workflow to Claude Code
tools.author: ayoubben18

steps.content:
Install AB Method in your project with a single command:

```bash
npx ab-method
```

This will automatically set up the AB Method in your `.claude` directory.

tools.name: Claude Code Documentation
tools.description: Local mirror of Claude Code documentation files from https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/, updated every 3 hours.
tools.author: Eric Buess

steps.content:
Run this single command:

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ericbuess/claude-code-docs/main/install.sh | bash
```

This will:
1. Install to `~/.claude-code-docs` (or migrate existing installation)
2. Create the `/docs` slash command to pass arguments to the tool and tell it where to find the docs
3. Set up a 'PreToolUse' 'Read' hook to enable automatic git pull when reading docs from the ~/.claude-code-docs`

tools.name: cc-sessions
tools.description: An opinionated approach to produce development with Claude Code.
tools.author: GWUDCAP

steps.content:
Install cc-sessions into a repo from the project root:

```bash
[npx|pipx run] cc-sessions
```

There are Python and Node packages - use whichever you have.

tools.name: Claude Code Explorer
tools.description: ccexp (short for claude-code-explorer) is a React Ink-based CLI tool that provides an interactive terminal interface for discovering, previewing, and managing Claude Code configuration files and slash commands. Navigate through your codebase to find CLAUDE.md files, slash command definitions, and other Claude-related configurations with a beautiful terminal UI.
tools.author: NakamuraTakumi

steps.content:
No installation required! Run directly with:

```bash
# Using Bun (fastest)
bunx ccexp@latest

# Using npm
npx ccexp@latest

# Using pnpm
pnpm dlx ccexp@latest
```
